results.title: [The hypotriglyceridemic action of the combination of L-carnitine + simvastatin vs. L-carnitine and vs. simvastatin].
results.text_hl: Previous studies had determined the role played by @CHEMICAL_Carnitine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002331 @@@L-carnitine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of altered @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@lipidemia@@@ in dialyzed @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Uremia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014511 @@@chronic uremia@@@.

citations.NLM: Savica V, Bellinghieri G, Lamanna F. [The hypotriglyceridemic action of the combination of L-carnitine + simvastatin vs. L-carnitine and vs. simvastatin]. Clin Ter. 1992 Jan;140(1 Pt 2):17-22. PMID: 1559317
citations.BibTeX: @article{1559317, title={[The hypotriglyceridemic action of the combination of L-carnitine + simvastatin vs. L-carnitine and vs. simvastatin].}, author={Savica V and Bellinghieri G and Lamanna F}, journal={Clin Ter}, volume={140}, number={1 Pt 2}, pages={17-22}}

results.title: [Dyslipidemia in the uremic patient: the therapeutic role played by simvastatin].
results.text_hl: The obtained data showed the substance's @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@ lowering effect, but no @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-related side effect in the dialysed @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Uremia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014511 @@@uremia@@@.

citations.NLM: Bellinghieri G, Angelé B, Savica V. [Dyslipidemia in the uremic patient: the therapeutic role played by simvastatin]. Clin Ter. 1992 Jan;140(1 Pt 2):11-6. PMID: 1559316
